name: Quin
description:
A simple and fun card game to play with friends!
Discard suit, or the same number, and be the first to run out of cards.
And watch out for the queens! Special cards will make everything more difficult!

Quin is a casual table game based on the classic card game Crazy Eights, origin of games like UNO, Mau Mau and Can Can.

  • Online Mode, 2-7 players
  • Team mode
  • Offline mode against Bots
